title: EUROPE RESEARCH ROUNDUP-Boohoo, Grainger, Pernod Ricard
text:
â€© Sept 9 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Boohoo, Grainger and Pernod Ricard , on Thursday.

HIGHLIGHTS

* Boohoo : Credit Suisse raises to outperform from neutral

* Convatec Group Plc : JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Draper Esprit Plc : Jefferies cuts to hold from buy

* Grainger : Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* Pernod Ricard : JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Thursday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* A.P. Moller-Maersk : Citigroup raises target to DKK 21,000 from DKK 20,000

* Anheuser Busch Inbev SA : BofA Global Research cuts price objective to EUR 54 from EUR 61

* Augean Plc : Stifel raises target price to 340p from 325p

* B&M : BofA Global Research raises price objective to 640p from 620p

* B&M : HSBC raises target price to 650p from 625p

* Beiersdorf AG : Goldman Sachs raises to buy from neutral

* BNP Paribas : Jefferies raises target price to EUR 72 from EUR 69

* Bodycote Plc : HSBC raises target price to 1100p from 975p

* Boohoo : Credit Suisse raises target price to 350p from 340p

* Boohoo : Credit Suisse raises to outperform from neutral

* Caretech Holdings Plc : HSBC raises target price to 760p from 700p

* Carlsberg : BofA Global Research cuts price objective to DKK 1280 from DKK 1310

* Carrefour : SocGen resumes coverage with buy rating

* Carrefour : SocGen resumes coverage with EUR 19.5 vs EUR 19 target price

* Cellnex Telecom SA : JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 76 from EUR 72

* Chargeurs SA : Midcap Partners raises target to EUR 32 from EUR 29; rating buy

* Coca Cola HBC : BofA Global Research cuts price objective to 2850p from 3150p

* Computacenter Plc : Stifel raises target price to 3,108p from 2,841p

* Continental AG : Independent Research cuts PT to EUR 114 from EUR 124; rating hold

* Convatec Group Plc : JP Morgan raises target price to 272p from 229p

* Convatec Group Plc : JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Credit Agricole : Jefferies raises target price to EUR 16.10 from EUR 15.50

* Deutsche Lufthansa AG : HSBC cuts target price to EUR 7 from EUR 8

* DR Martens Plc : HSBC raises target price to 520p from 510p

* Draper Esprit Plc : Jefferies cuts to hold from buy

* Draper Esprit Plc : Jefferies raises target price to 1200p from 967p

* E.ON SE : Berenberg raises target price to EUR 13.20 from EUR 11

* Edpr : UBS raises target price to EUR 22.45 from EUR 20.45

* Eiffage : Barclays raises target price to EUR 113 from EUR 105

* Enagas : UBS raises target price to EUR 17.9 from EUR 17.25

* Endesa : Kepler Cheuvreux raises to buy from hold

* Endesa : UBS cuts target price to EUR 26.7 from EUR 29.35

* Grainger : Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* Hays : Barclays raises to overweight from equal weight

* Heineken NV : BofA Global Research cuts price objective to EUR 120 from EUR 122

* Henkel AG & Co KGaA : Goldman Sachs cuts to neutral from buy
